1.title: Opening Night
1.plot: It is opening night at Grundy County Speedway. DJ Werkmeister shows up the competition and wins the first race of the season. Back out for the second night , a rumor flies through the pits that a target has been placed on DJ Werkmeister's head.

2.title: That Car Is Fast
2.plot: A reality series that follows the racing seasons of Pure Stock car racers in the heart of the Midwest at the Grundy County Motor Speedway in Morris, IL. Pure Stock, the west division of stock car racing is for the absolute beginner. With a 4-cylinder junk car and a few hundred bucks, anyone can drive a race car and win!

imdb.title: Pure Stock
plot: A reality series that follows the racing seasons of _Pure Stock_ (qv) car racers in the heart of the Midwest at the Grundy County Motor Speedway in Morris, IL. _Pure Stock_ (qv), the west division of stock car racing is for the absolute beginner. With a 4-cylinder junk car and a few hundred bucks, anyone can drive a race car and win!::Michelle De Long
